metadata.title: CVE-2019-12816 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Modules.cpp in ZNC before 1.7.4-rc1 allows remote authenticated non-adminusers to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code by loading a modulewith a crafted name.

criterions.comment: znc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
